nodes.bodyText: Why did you delete a line randomly here?
Better: append this unconditionally, and only append the other part based on the condition.
Oh also on second thought, you should also be using append instead of concatenation.
Please don't do this! I know the IDE will do this automatically, but you can turn it off. Wildcards are great in some cases, but I don't think this is one of them.
Every config option should have a description. What's clear to you may not be for others.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -381,6 +381,8 @@ list:
     # Uncomment the line below to simply list all players with no grouping
     #Players: '*'
 
+real-names-on-list: false

nodes.bodyText: Looks like you added extra space here for whatever reason
Might look cleaner if you chain append calls (this is common for StringBuilder; example: .append("a").append(b) -> "ab").

I think this should still be clarified a bit more. Maybe something like:
"Displays real names in /list next to players who are using a nickname."
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -381,6 +381,9 @@ list:
     # Uncomment the line below to simply list all players with no grouping
     #Players: '*'
 
+# Show realnames on /list if player has a nickname
